text.0: ye liberal heroes vājas and Ṛbhukṣans come and delight you with our flowing soma.
text.1: may your strength vibhus as ye come to meet us turn hitherward your car that brings men profit.
text.2: may we as Ṛbhu with your Ṛbhus conquer strength with our strength as vibhus with the vibhus.
text.3: may vāja aid us in the fight for booty and helped by indra may we quell the foeman.
text.4: for they rule many tribes with high dominion and conquer all their foes in close encounter.
text.5: may indra vibhvan vāja and Ṛbhukṣan destroy by turns the wicked foemans valour.
text.6: now deities give us ample room and freedom be all of you oneminded our protection.
text.7: so let the vasus grant us strength and vigour preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
